SyntaxHighlight.summary: Provides methods for HTML Syntax Highighting.

StripLeadingWhiteSpace.summary: Strips the specified number of leading whitespace characters from an HTML string.
StripLeadingWhiteSpace.param: The number of leading whitespace characters to strip.

AddSyntaxHighlight.summary: Adds the Syntax Highlighting to the HTML code line.

FormatCode.summary: Strips the defined leading white spaces and applies Syntax Highlighting.

SetUserTypes.summary: Reads the User Types from a file or creates the file if it does not exist

UpdateUserTypes.summary: Updates the User Types if a new one is found in the HTML code line.
